scripts.watch: watchify -v -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] src/main.js -o docs/bundle.js
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --no-sourceMaps ] src/main.js | uglifyjs > docs/bundle.js
scripts.buildw: SET NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --no-sourceMaps ] src/main.js | uglifyjs > docs/bundle.js
